ISSUE.TITLE: Add details page for Execution Environments
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE - Feature Idea ##### SUMMARY Add details page for execution environments. See: https://tower-mockups.testing.ansible.com/patternfly/exec-env/exec-env-detail/

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add feature to Add/Edit Execution Environments Add feature to Add/Edit Execution Environments. Also, add key for `ExecutionEnvironmentsList`. See: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/7887
